channel.title: Npc drops =[
channel.description: hey guys i recently changed my npc drops i deleted the old drops cause the old ones where shit, corp beast would drop adamant arrows n charms so i deleted those and put my own drops and when i compile gives no errors when i go to kill it it drops nothing after i killed it like 15 times it finally drops an item and its a green charm ... watafak i even made drop rate like 40% and put over 10 items for it to drop idk wats up with it .... help plz =p

item.dc:creator: @laurensman laurensman
item.description:
@laurensman wrote:

lawlllllllllll its because you probably didnt put this

Npcid/rarity
corpid/15

You need to put the npcid:rarity 4151:1----- etc common drops
rare drops here… so say 995:5000000000 rares go on the bottom

item.title: Npc drops =[
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

xxbanditxx:

hey guys i recently changed my npc drops i deleted the old drops cause the old ones where shit, corp beast would drop adamant arrows n charms so i deleted those and put my own drops and when i compile gives no errors when i go to kill it it drops nothing after i killed it like 15 times it finally drops an item and its a green charm … watafak i even made drop rate like 40% and put over 10 items for it to drop idk wats up with it … help plz =p

There’s this thing called chance. You may get it on your first kill, you may get it on your 100th kill. You could post your npc drops and we could look over to make sure you did it correctly. Also, if you REALLY wanted to get into detail, you could look at where the npc drops are being loaded for when the npc is dead and see how it interacts with each set of data.

Read full topic

I would highly recommend starting fresh with the original PI client+server that comes with this guide.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,508325.0.html[/quote]
Are you even going to try to help or are you going to just say start completely over? At OP, show me your npc drop that you just added.
